comments:
I've installed JCOP tools using update manger from
http://www.zurich.ibm.com/jcop/products/tools3.html

Now Eclipse 3.0 M6 crasing on start with NPE exception. If I manually delete
JCOP features it again starts working fine.

Please let me know if you need to see a stacktrace for the .log file.

Here is the log file. It looks like a bug in some code related to the registry.
